name: Gunswinger
description:
A game by Ivo, Jeroen and Dennis for the GMTK GameJam 2020, with theme "Out Of Control".

It is a literal on-rail shooter but you don't control the gun.
Instead, you 'control' the cable car the gun is mounted on, swinging it left to right hectically.

Instructions:

The goal is to kill the tanks and helicopters.
Your gun fires every 3 seconds.
You can aim it by swinging your gondola, use the left/right arrow keys or A/D to move it.

This version also has a debugging option enabled where you can fire with space twice per second.

Developed using the Godot engine.
